channel.title: [PI] Make Object face other Directions [PI]
channel.description:
Sup? Im havin' trouble on facing these:
[code=java] c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2667, 3429, 1, 10);//bank home c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2669, 3427, 1, 10);//bank home c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2669, 3429, 1, 10);//bank home c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2667, 3427, 1, 10);//bank home[/code]
To South-East Noth-West So on.

item.title: [PI] Make Object face other Directions [PI]
item.dc:creator: @nearfatality nearfatality
item.description:
@nearfatality wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:2, topic:395115”]The fourth number there is for the direction you want it to face. So try:

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2667, 3429, 2, 10);//bank home c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2669, 3427, 3, 10);//bank home c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2669, 3429, -1, 10);//bank home c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2667, 3427, 0, 10);//bank home

And just see which one is the direction you want it to face. :)[/quote]

Thanks bro

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Make Object face other Directions [PI]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

The fourth number there is for the direction you want it to face. So try:

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2667, 3429, 2, 10);//bank home c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2669, 3427, 3, 10);//bank home c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2669, 3429, -1, 10);//bank home c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2667, 3427, 0, 10);//bank home

And just see which one is the direction you want it to face.

Read full topic
